author: mcconnell
msg: Remove dependence of deprecated thread interface bring class in line with excalibur-thread-2.0.0.

author: mcconnell
msg: Add three utility file filters.  These sources are copied from the long since deprricated excalibur.io package and collectively make up the set of excalibur.io dependnecies not already covered by cornerstone store.

author: mcconnell
msg: replace excalibur io dep with masterstore equivalent

author: mcconnell
msg: Remove reference to deprecated excalibur.io class (replaced by the same class under cornerstone store) - and updated the context handler to look for the working directory using standard context keys prior to container specific keys.

author: mcconnell
msg: Setup of a buildfile that simples establishes the mailet api, implo and james server imp jar files independency of any container concerns.  This is sufficient to move the focus over to gump to get a clean output.
